sourcesContent:
Find your match

Come on in to view your matches... all you need to do in sign up!"

Register from goes here

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit{ registerMode = false; constructor(){} ngOnInit(): void{ } registerToggle() { this.registerMode = ! this.registerMode; } }
